sub_fields.label: Alternative paragraph style
sub_fields.name: panel_paralt
sub_fields.instructions: Tick the checkbox to enable a more prominent paragraph style for this copy area.

sub_fields.label: Image offset
sub_fields.name: image_offset
sub_fields.instructions: Add an offset value for this image to customise the layout.

sub_fields.message: This panel will display one testimonial at random in this location. Testimonials can be added or edited under 'Testimonials'.

sub_fields.label: Panel height
sub_fields.name: panel_height
sub_fields.instructions: Enter a height for this panel.
